did.abstract: Sermons written by Mathurin Guerin, with prayers to be delivered before and after the sermons. There are nine sermons handwritten into a bound volume. The Reverend Mr. Henry Heywood, who died in October 1755, preached the first six in Charleston, South Carolina.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Nothing is known about the author, Mathurin Guerin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sermons written by Mathurin Guerin, with prayers to be delivered before and after the sermons. There are nine sermons handwritten into a bound volume. The Reverend Mr. Henry Heywood, who died in October 1755, preached the first six in Charleston, South Carolina. The 193 pages of sermons are handwritten and very fragile.
